news_header: The Netherlands has confirmed its participation in the 2025 Eurovision Song Contest after uncertainty about its involvement.
news_text: The Dutch participation in the upcoming Eurovision was initially unclear, but the Netherlands has now announced its participation for the 2025 contest, as reported by Avrotros. The European Broadcasting Union (EBU) had allowed the Netherlands time to decide. This year, Dutch representative Joost Klein was dismissed due to a photographer's threatening behavior, and he ultimately declined the opportunity to represent the country. The 2025 Eurovision Song Contest will take place in Basel, Switzerland.
